text: "The Wizard" is a 1970 song by English heavy metal band Black Sabbath. The song is on their first studio album Black Sabbath. On music charts, it went to number 4 in the United Kingdom and number 61 in the United States. == References == Category:1970 songs Category:Black Sabbath songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Heavy metal
title: The Wizard (Black Sabbath song)
